properties.description:
Created by olseir, 24.06.2020
Not included in any pipeline

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		underwriting_year_start_date as date,
		underwriting_year_end_Date as date,
		underwriting_year_number as long,
		underwriting_year_time_span as long,
		underwriting_year_key as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select underwriting_year_start_date, underwriting_year_end_Date, underwriting_year_number, underwriting_year_time_span ,underwriting_year_key  from dwh_stage.sta_dim_time a',
	format: 'query') ~> DimTime
AddDimensionKey select(mapColumn(
		year_number_key = RemoveDuplicates@underwriting_year_key,
		year_start_date = underwriting_year_start_date,
		year_end_Date = underwriting_year_end_Date,
		year_number = underwriting_year_number,
		year_time_span = underwriting_year_time_span,
		dimension_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutputColumns
Aggregate1 derive(dimension_key = underwriting_year_key) ~> AddDimensionKey
DimTime filter(!isNull(underwriting_year_key)) ~> FilterInValidYears
FilterInValidYears aggregate(groupBy(underwriting_year_key),
	each(match(name!='underwriting_year_key'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
SelectOutputColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		dimension_key,
		year_time_span,
		year_number_key,
		year_start_date,
		year_number,
		year_end_date = year_end_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimTimeAccYear
